name: Wordscapes with Friends
description:
Play crossword puzzle with friends and become smarter. This multiplayer crossy game will let you compete with friends - just send them link to the game and start playing. Challenge yourself and train your brain - crosswords are real fun!

Solve challenging puzzles in different modes:
- play with buddy - send him link and start your competition;
- play with random player - you will always have someone to battle with;
- enjoy arcade mode - levels become more and more difficult

Solve thousands of puzzles offline - no wifi needed for story mode.

This super addictive wordscapes puzzle suits anyone who likes scrabble, word crumble, word twist or word match games. Cross word game for kids and adults!
publishers: Severex PL SP Z O O
